byline.original: By WINNIE HU and NOAH REMNICK

abstract: Results of several dozen standardized tests taken by third graders at prestigious Teachers College Community School in Harlem are invalidated due to improprieties by principal Jeanene Worrell-Breeden, who committed suicide in April after allegations were leveled.
lead_paragraph: The Education Department invalidated the results of the state exam taken by third graders amid allegations of testing improprieties by the principal of the Teachers College Community School.

headline.main: City Invalidates Test Scores of Third Graders at Harlem School
headline.print_headline: Test Scores Invalidated at a School in Harlem

snippet: The Education Department invalidated the results of the state exam taken by third graders amid allegations of testing improprieties by the principal of the Teachers College Community School.
